Name: Bohemian Iced Tea
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A fruity and refreshing drink with surprising flavours.
History: Created by Alex Kammerling at Detroit, London, England. Originally stirred in a tea pot and served in tea cups.
Nutrition: One serving of Bohemian Iced Tea contains 216 calories
